details: Developed a fixture script to clean and prepare weekly FAO-provided farmers’ market product price datasets for PostgreSQL and Django integration.
Implemented dynamic visualizations to display product price trends over time for user-selected items
Utilized Django’s ORM to structure data models and manage database operations in a clean and scalable way.
Integrated Wagtail CMS into the web application to enable dynamic content management
Developed and maintained the hotel’s website using Wix and custom JavaScript enhancements.
Managed website content, structure, and user interface to improve user experience and booking accessibility.
Administered SEO strategy, optimizing site metadata and structure to increase visibility and search engine ranking.
Monitored site analytics to guide improvements in performance and user engagement.
